4 SuperquadricSampling::SuperquadricSampling(const sq_fitting::sq &sq_params) : params_(sq_params), cloud_(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>)
5 {
6  struct timeval time;
7  gettimeofday(&time,NULL);
8  srand((time.tv_sec * 1000) + (time.tv_usec / 1000));
9  r_ = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float> (RAND_MAX);
10  g_ = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float> (RAND_MAX);
11  b_ = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float> (RAND_MAX);
12 }

14 void SuperquadricSampling::transformCloud(const pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr &input_cloud, pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr& output_cloud)
15 {
16  Eigen::Affine3f transform;
17  sq::sq_create_transform(params_.pose, transform);
18  pcl::transformPointCloud(*input_cloud, *output_cloud, transform);
19 }

21 //Similar to sampling in https://github.com/ana-GT/GSoC_PCL
22 void SuperquadricSampling::sample()
23 {
24  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
25  double cn, sn, sw, cw;
26  double n,w;
27  int num_n, num_w;
28  double dn, dw;
29  dn = 5.0 * M_PI/180.0;
30  dw = 5.0 * M_PI/180.0;
31  num_n = (int)(M_PI/dn);
32  num_w = (int)(2*M_PI/dw);
33  n = -M_PI/2.0;
34  for(int i=0;i<num_n;++i)
35  {
36  n+=dn;
37  cn = cos(n);
38  sn = sin(n);
39  w = -M_PI;
40  for(int j=0;j<num_w;++j)
41  {
42  w+=dw;
43  cw = cos(w);
44  sw = sin(w);
45  PointT p;
46  p.x = params_.a1 * pow(fabs(cn), params_.e1) * pow (fabs(cw), params_.e2);
47  p.y = params_.a2 * pow(fabs(cn), params_.e1) * pow (fabs(sw), params_.e2);
48  p.z = params_.a3 * pow(fabs(sn), params_.e1);
49  p.r = r_*255;
50  p.g = g_*255;
51  p.b = b_*255;
52 
53  if(cn*cw <0){p.x = -p.x;}
54  if(cn*sw <0){p.y = -p.y;}
55  if(sn<0){p.z = -p.z;}
56  cloud->points.push_back(p);
57  cloud->height = 1;
58  cloud->width = cloud->points.size();
59  cloud->is_dense = true;
60  }
61  }
62  transformCloud(cloud, cloud_);
63 }
64 
65 static double dTheta_0(double K, double e, double a1, double a2, double t)
66 {
67  double factor = K/a2 - pow(t,e);
68  double po = pow(fabs(factor), 1.0/e);
69  double m = fabs(po - t);
70  return m;
71 }
72 
73 static double dTheta(double K, double e, double a1, double a2, double t)
74 {
75  double num = (cos(t)* cos(t)* sin(t)*sin(t));
76  double den1 = a1*a1*pow(fabs(cos(t)), 2*e) * pow(fabs(sin(t)),4);
77  double den2 = a2*a2*pow(fabs(sin(t)), 2*e) * pow(fabs(cos(t)),4);
78  return (K/e)*sqrt(num/(den1+den2));
79 }
80 
81 static void sample_superEllipse(const double a1, const double a2, const double e, const int N, pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr &cloud)
82 {
83  cloud->points.resize(0);
84  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud_base(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
85  double theta;
86  double thresh = 0.1;
87  int numIter;
88  int maxIter = 500;
89  double K;
90  if(a1<a2){K = 2*M_PI*a1/(double)N;}
91  else{K = 2*M_PI*a2/(double)N;}
92 
93  theta = 0;
94  numIter = 0;
95  do
96  {
97  double dt = dTheta_0(K, e, a1, a2, theta);
98  theta +=dt;
99  numIter++;
100 
101  if(dt !=0)
102  {
103  PointT p;
104  p.x = a1 * pow(fabs(cos(theta)), e);
105  p.y = a2 * pow(fabs(sin(theta)), e);
106  p.z = 0;
107  cloud_base->points.push_back(p);
108  }
109  }while(theta<thresh && numIter<maxIter);
110 
111 
112  if(theta<thresh){theta = thresh;}
113  numIter = 0;
114  do
115  {
116  theta +=dTheta(K, e, a1,a2, theta);
117  numIter++;
118  PointT p;
119  p.x = a1 * pow(fabs(cos(theta)), e);
120  p.y = a2 * pow(fabs(sin(theta)), e);
121  p.z = 0;
122  cloud_base->points.push_back(p);
123  }
124  while(theta<M_PI/2.0 - thresh && numIter<maxIter);
125 
126  double alpha = M_PI/2.0 - theta;
127  numIter = 0;
128  while(alpha>0 && numIter<maxIter)
129  {
130  alpha -=dTheta(K, e, a2, a1, alpha);
131  numIter++;
132  PointT p;
133  p.x = a1 * pow(fabs(sin(alpha)),e);
134  p.y = a2 * pow(fabs(cos(alpha)),e);
135  p.z = 0;
136  cloud_base->points.push_back(p);
137  }
138 
139  double xsign[4] = {-1,1,1,-1};
140  double ysign[4] = {-1,-1,1,1};
141  for (int i=0;i<4;++i)
142  {
143  for (int j=0;j<cloud_base->points.size();++j)
144  {
145  PointT p, b;
146  b = cloud_base->points[j];
147  p.x = xsign[i] * b.x;
148  p.y = ysign[i] * b.y;
149  p.z = b.z;
150  cloud->points.push_back(p);
151  }
152  }
153  cloud->width = 1;
154  cloud->height = cloud->points.size();
155 }
156 
157 void SuperquadricSampling::sample_pilu_fisher()
158 {
159  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
160  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud_s1(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
161  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud_s2(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
162  int N = 300;
163  sample_superEllipse(1, params_.a3, params_.e1, N, cloud_s1);
164  sample_superEllipse(params_.a1, params_.a2, params_.e2, N, cloud_s2);
165  PointT p1, p2;
166  int n = cloud_s1->points.size()/4;
167  for(int i=n;i<4*n;++i)
168  {
169  p1 = cloud_s1->points[i];
170  for(int j=0;j<cloud_s2->points.size();++j)
171  {
172  p2 = cloud_s2->points[j];
173  PointT p;
174  p.x = p1.x * p2.x;
175  p.y = p1.x * p2.y;
176  p.z = p1.y;
177  p.r = r_*255;
178  p.g = g_*255;
179  p.b = b_*255;
180  cloud->points.push_back(p);
181  }
182  }
183  cloud->height = 1;
184  cloud->width = cloud->points.size();
185  cloud->is_dense = true;
186  transformCloud(cloud, cloud_);
187 }

190 {
191  cloud = cloud_;
192 }
